page.description: .SELECTED_RECORDS()returns the record numbers of selected records.

argument.name: parent_only|C
argument.description: Determines which records to select, in the context of a set.

item.name: .T. = Return only records from the primary table.

section.description: The following example shows the results when the browse is looking at a set composed of five different tables.
Now, restrict the query to just the parent table in the set.
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = browse.view("Invoice") ? ptr.Selected_Records(.t.) = 1 2 3 4
